solution_line_template: Anne's male cat weighs {female_cat_weight} x {multiplier_male_cat} = <<{female_cat_weight}*{multiplier_male_cat}={male_cat_weight}>>{male_cat_weight} kilograms.
Thus, Anne is carrying a total of {female_cat_weight} + {male_cat_weight} = <<{female_cat_weight}+{male_cat_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} kilograms when she carries both of them.
